util
Class TwitterTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  util.Tokenizer
      util.TwitterTokenizer

public class TwitterTokenizer
extends Tokenizer

Extends the general tokenizer by adding @ and # as valid word characters because of their special meaning in Twitter text strings.

Author:
sh

Method Detail

tokenize

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenize(java.lang.String text)
Tokenizes the text with the specialized isWordCharacter(Character) method, then glues the special chacartes back onto the following word.

Overrides:
tokenize in class Tokenizer
Returns:
a list of words with any attached punctuation removed

isWordCharacter

public boolean isWordCharacter(java.lang.Character ch)
Adds @ and # as valid word characters.

Overrides:
isWordCharacter in class Tokenizer
Returns:
true if the character can start or end a word; false otherwise.
